Draft Rating:

D+

Billy Knight ranks in the 37th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Knight's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 4 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Josh Smith with 17th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Antonis Fotsis with 48th pick but was worth 19th pick.
  • Drafted Travis Hansen with 37th pick but was worth 21th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Marvin Williams with 2th pick but was worth 43th pick.
  • Drafted Shelden Williams with 5th pick but was worth 48th pick.
  • Drafted Stromile Swift with 2th pick but was worth 40th pick.

Trade Rating:

D+

Billy Knight ranks in the 36th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Joe Johnson to ATL.
  • Lost Boris Diaw, Rajon Rondo, Robin Lopez to PHO.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Tony Delk, Antoine Walker to ATL.
  • Lost Alan Henderson, Jason Terry to DAL.

Signing Rating:

F

Billy Knight ranks in the 14th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Stephen Jackson in 2003.
  • Signed Mikki Moore in 2003.
  • Signed Jeremy Richardson in 2007.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Zaza Pachulia in 2005.
  • Signed Jason Collier in 2004.
  • Signed Rodney Buford in 2001.
